description: Adding chicken makes this aloo gobi a tasty and hearty main dish.
keywords: Indian curry,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Potato,Wheat free,Chicken,Spinach,Cauliflower,Dairy free
name: Chicken Aloo Gobi Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 300g potatoes, peeled and chopped into cubes
1 bunch coriander, fresh, chopped, stalks included

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 200Â°C. Boil the potatoes in a pot of water for 6-7 minutes. Remove with a slotted spoon and add the cauliflower. Cook for 3 minutes and drain well. Toss the potatoes and cauliflower in a bowl with a little oil.

Spread the potatoes and cauliflower on a baking sheet and roast for 12 minutes. Heat the oil and cook the chicken and onions for 6-7 minutes. Add the garlic and ginger and cook for 2 minutes, stir in the spices, coriander stalks and peas and cook for 2 minutes.
Add the cauliflower and potatoes to the pan and stir to coat, adding a little water if necessary. Add the spinach and cook for 2-3 minutes, until wilted.
Serve with the rest of the coriander on top and mango chutney on the side.
